content:
SqlInt16 Struct

Definition

Represents a 16-bit signed integer to be stored in or retrieved from a database.

In this Article

[System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaProvider("GetXsdType")]
public struct SqlInt16 : IComparable, System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable, System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable
Inheritance
Object
System.ValueType
SqlInt16

Constructors

SqlInt16(Int16)

Initializes a new instance of the SqlInt16 structure using the supplied short integer parameter.

public SqlInt16 (short value);
value
Int16

A short integer.

Fields

MaxValue

A constant representing the largest possible value of a SqlInt16.

public static readonly System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16 MaxValue;

Remarks

The value of this constant is 32,767.

MinValue

A constant representing the smallest possible value of a SqlInt16.

public static readonly System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16 MinValue;

Remarks

The value of this constant is -32,768.

Null

Represents a DBNull that can be assigned to this instance of the SqlInt16 structure.

public static readonly System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16 Null;

Remarks

Null functions as a constant for the SqlInt16 structure. For more information, see Handling Null Values.

Zero

Represents a zero value that can be assigned to the stem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value* property of an instance of the SqlInt16 structure.

public static readonly System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16 Zero;

Remarks

The Zero field is a constant for the SqlInt16 structure.

Properties

IsNull

Indicates whether this SqlInt16 structure is null.

public bool IsNull { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if null. Otherwise, false. For more information, see Handling Null Values.

Value

Gets the value of this instance of SqlInt16 structure. This property is read-only.

public short Value { get; }
Value
Int16

A short integer representing the value of this SqlInt16 structure.
